About

Iâ€™m a Data Scientist at Cargo, an e-commerce and ad-tech platform for the ridesharing industry, working on all things data. I also volunteer as a code coach at Codebar, and occasionally hang out with Charge VC.

I graduated from Swarthmore College, where I studied CS and Physics. During my time there, I conducted research on Pedestrian Dynamics using Statistical Physics. Some of my other projects include Deep Generative Models and Parallel Monte Carlo Tree Search.

Some of my past experiences include Sisense, Contently, University of Washington Applied Physics Laboratory, National Institute of Standards and Technology, and Harvard-Smithsonian Center for Astrophysics.
